title: Dusk of Dawn - series of phrases

content.question: The series of phrases in Paragraph 1 ("in muscles ... become divine") suggests the

choices.label: uncertainty that people felt about their own social class
many ways that class structure was maintained
inability of government to rule without the support of religion
transition from a society ruled by force to one ruled by law

content.answer: many ways that class structure was maintained

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how writers create, combine, and place independent and dependent clauses to show relationships between and among ideas.
